channel.title: Mac on 雜
channel.description: Recent content in Mac on 雜

item.title: Init_mac
item.description: REMIDNER copy your previous terminal history Set up byronz.github.com ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -C "byron.zhu.xq@gmail.com" cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub | pbcopy add ssh key in github git clone git@github.com:byronz/blog.git if you have public, need to readd as submodule git rm -f public git submodule add -b master git@github.com:byronz/byronz.github.io.git public cd themes git submodule add -b master git@github.com:mgjohansen/hucore.git hucore install hugo brew install hugo https://gohugo.io/hosting-and-deployment/hosting-on-github/ Python brew install python3 cd /tmp && curl https://bootstrap.
